reviews.review_text: The case study breakdowns made all the difference. I learn best by doing, and the course accommodated that perfectly. The downloadable worksheets helped me finally understand trauma-informed approach.

This certification completely transformed my practice. I was struggling to transition from teaching to Default, and this course gave me the exact framework I needed. The advanced protocols module alone was worth the investment. Now I have 4 new clients and finally feel confident in my niche.

Decent course. The Module 4 module was fantastic, but the marketing section didn't deliver as much value. Could use more real client examples. Still learned enough to justify the cost, but room for improvement.

Best professional investment I've made in years. The practical focus made complex topics accessible, and I immediately applied progress tracker with my first client post-certification. Revenue up 45% in 90 days. Worth every penny.

As someone with a background in psychology, I appreciated the academic rigor. The integration of cognitive-behavioral and narrative therapy approaches was brilliant. This isn't just 'coaching tips' — it's legitimate professional training.

Solid content overall, but I wish there was more on marketing strategies. The Module 3 module felt rushed compared to others. Still valuable, just expected more depth given the price point. Would recommend, but set expectations accordingly.

Best professional investment I've made in years. The practical focus made complex topics accessible, and I immediately applied progress tracker with my first client post-certification. Revenue up 88% in 6 weeks. Worth every penny.

Good certification with practical tools, though some modules felt repetitive. The progress tracker was excellent, but advanced techniques could use expansion. Worth it if you're new to default, but experienced practitioners might find some sections basic.

Skeptical about the price initially, but the client handouts templates alone saved me 25 hours of work. Closed 5 new clients in 90 days using the pitch framework from the ethics module. Already made back 5x my investment.

Best professional investment I've made in years. The practical focus made complex topics accessible, and I immediately applied progress tracker with my first client post-certification. Revenue up 78% in 3 months. Worth every penny.

The instructor support was exceptional. Sarah personally answered my question about setting boundaries within 24 hours. The peer discussion forum helped me troubleshoot real client scenarios. Never felt alone in the learning process.

Best professional investment I've made in years. The real-world examples made complex topics accessible, and I immediately applied progress tracker with my first client post-certification. Revenue up 66% in 3 months. Worth every penny.

Skeptical about the price initially, but the marketing scripts templates alone saved me 14 hours of work. Closed 13 new clients in 6 weeks using the pitch framework from Module 3. Already made back 3x my investment.

This certification completely transformed my practice. I was struggling to transition from fitness training to Default, and this course gave me the exact framework I needed. The ethical boundaries module alone was worth the investment. Now I have 3 new clients and finally feel confident in my niche.

The instructor support was exceptional. the instructor personally answered my question about pricing my services within a few hours. The peer discussion forum helped me troubleshoot real client scenarios. Never felt alone in the learning process.

This certification completely transformed my practice. I was struggling to transition from traditional therapy to Default, and this course gave me the exact framework I needed. The client onboarding module alone was worth the investment. Now I have 5 new clients and finally feel confident in my niche.
Loved the case discussions. Being able to discuss difficult clients with peers who 'get it' was invaluable. The form library is something I still reference all the time. Great ongoing value.

I've taken 7 courses in this field, but this one stands out. The practical focus on client acquisition helped me pivot my entire business model. Within 3 months I had doubled my rates. The community support was incredible too.
